sen.j: 藤原孝範（ふじわらのたかのり、保元3年（1158年） - 天福 (日本)元年8月（1233年））は、平安時代末期から鎌倉時代初期にかけての官人。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Takanori (1158-September 1233) was a government official (lower or middle ranked) in the late Heian period to the early Kamakura period.

sen.e: In March 1187, when Takanori, who was monjosho (student of literary studies in the Imperial University), participated in composition at Gosho-dokoro (an office to maintain books in the Imperial Court), he was praised by Kanezane KUJO as "honorable man."
